response_headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' region1.google-analytics.com www.googletagmanager.com unpkg.com cdn.tagcommander.com tag.aticdn.net *.hotjar.com cdn.trustcommander.net; connect-src 'self' ws: *.hotjar.com https://privacy.trustcommander.net https://privacy.commander1.com https://region1.google-analytics.com https://in.hotjar.com https://*.ingest.sentry.io https://hd.pe.fr; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://script.hotjar.com; frame-src https://vars.hotjar.com; img-src 'self' data: https://hd.pe.fr https://*.wikimedia.org https://*.openstreetmap.org https://script.hotjar.com; manifest-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://unpkg.com

content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented with unsafe sources inside style-src. This includes 'unsafe-inline', data: or overly broad sources such as https:.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: All cookies use the Secure flag and all session cookies use the HttpOnly flag

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers, but is restricted to specific domains

public-key-pinning.name: public-key-pinning
public-key-pinning.score_description: HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) header not implemented

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) is implemented and all scripts are loaded securely

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) header set to SAMEORIGIN or DENY
